description: This file implements an authentication state manager for a Flutter application, handling user registration, login, logout, and state initialization.

classes.name: AuthState
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier subclass managing user authentication state, including login, registration, and logout functionalities.

methods.name: initializeAuth
methods.description: Initializes authentication state based on stored token.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user with email, password, and name.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Logs in a user with email and password.
